div.h1: No School/Distance Learning in effect March 30th-May 4th.

div.p: Lac qui Parle Valley Schools Distance Learning Plan is in effect from March 30th-May 4th due to COVID-19 containment strategies. Read More

p.span: Take a minute to give us some feedback. Please take once per child.

div.p: (please register by 10:00 am to receive a meal for the following day)

span.em: The mission of the Lac qui Parle Valley School District is to be a unified community that promotes
meaningful, student-centered educational experiences which prepare every student to excel.
